meanings.definition: A person or thing that digests.
meanings.sent1: The digestor in our body breaks down food for us.
meanings.sent2: The digestive system acts as a digestor for nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The little robot was programmed to be a digestor for all the information it received.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a digestor, processing thoughts quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The digestor in the kitchen compost bin helped turn food scraps into rich soil.

meanings.definition: A device or machine that digests.
meanings.sent1: The sewage digestor at the treatment plant helps break down waste.
meanings.sent2: The biogas digestor converts organic matter into energy.
meanings.sent3: The digestor machine hummed softly as it processed the materials.
meanings.sent4: The digestor worked tirelessly, like a silent helper in the background.
meanings.sent5: The compost digestor in the backyard turned food scraps into nutrient-rich soil for the garden.

meanings.definition: A chemical substance that aids in digestion.
meanings.sent1: Enzymes act as a digestor to help break down food in our stomach.
meanings.sent2: Probiotics can be considered a digestor for gut health.
meanings.sent3: The digestor supplement made it easier for her to digest heavy meals.
meanings.sent4: The herbal digestor tea soothed her stomach after a big dinner.
meanings.sent5: The natural digestor in papaya helps with digestion and bloating.
